description: Supported markdown section structure for story.md files in Kumpli recipes. These sections are used by the build system to parse and format recipes.

h1_sections.description: Top-level sections (# heading) - NOT CURRENTLY SUPPORTED
h1_sections.note: No H1 sections should be used in story.md files yet. May be supported in future.

h2_sections.note: These are the main anchors for automatic processing. Background and Kumpli Notes are required. Cooking Moments is optional but recommended if photos exist.

validation_rules.no_h1_allowed: story.md files should not contain any # (H1) sections
validation_rules.required_sections_must_exist: ## Background and ## Kumpli Notes must be present
validation_rules.only_allowed_h2_sections: Only Background, Kumpli Notes, and Cooking Moments are allowed as ## sections
validation_rules.case_sensitive: Section names are case-sensitive and must match exactly
